item.title: NBA memo: Must assess 'dire risks' of gambling
item.description: An NBA memo sent to teams said the league is reassessing its measures on legal sports betting, how it should be regulated and ways to protect players ...

item.title: Source: Wentz to have season-ending surgery
item.description: Vikings quarterback Carson Wentz will undergo season-ending surgery on his left shoulder, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

item.title: Rams acquire CB McCreary in trade with Titans
item.description: The Titans traded cornerback Roger McCreary to the Rams for a conditional draft pick swap on Monday.

item.title: Ex-NFL star Peterson still in jail after DWI arrest
item.description: Former NFL running back Adrian Peterson remained jailed on Monday after being arrested a day earlier in a Houston suburb on charges of driving while i...

item.title: Smart on Kelly, SEC firings: 'The world we live in'
item.description: Georgia's Kirby Smart, asked about LSU's Brian Kelly becoming the latest high-profile coach to have been fired, said, "It's the world we live in."
